attributes.action: ... get rid of National Speed Limit signs and replace them with numerical speed limit signs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you ask most people what the 'National Speed Limit' actually is, most people say '60 or 70 mph', but where does it change and is it always appropriate? By signing this petition, you will be helping to get rid of these signs and replace them with actual numerical speed limit signs, thereby reducing confusion to UK and (especially) foreign road users.
